name: stalker
quote: May they believe in themselves and become as helpless as children. For softness is great and strength is worthless.

name: In The Mood For Love
quote: It is a restless momemnt. She has kept her head lowered, to give him a chance to get closer. But he could not for lack of courage. She turns and walk away

name: Goodbye Lenin!
quote: The future lay in our hands. Uncertain, yet promising

name: The Legend Of 1900
quote: Winter comes, you wish it was summer. Summer comes, you live in dread of winter. That's why we never tire of travel

name: The Age of innocence
quote: The real lonliness is living among all these kind of people who only ask one to pretend

name: The Wind Will Carry Us
quote: When you close your eyes on this world, this beauty, this wonders of nature and the generosity of God, it means you will never be coming back.

name: The Best Of Youth
quote: Life changes fast, life changes in an instant. You sit down to dinner and life as you know it ends.
